body_html:
A workaround has been provided for using the full MKL with TF r1.3; details at the Intel forums link above. In my opinion, this issue can be closed.

Additional information about building TF with the full MKL, including Eigen-MKL integration, can be found in the comments attached to this document: https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/tensorflow-optimizations-on-modern-intel-architecture

body:
A workaround has been provided for using the full MKL with TF r1.3; details at the Intel forums link above. In my opinion, this issue can be closed.

Additional information about building TF with the full MKL, including Eigen-MKL integration, can be found in the comments attached to this document: https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/tensorflow-optimizations-on-modern-intel-architecture
